title: NFL Week 2 Recap: Patrick Mahomes is a Golden God (Football 09/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to break down every single game from Week 2 of the NFL season. Is Patrick Mahomes the greatest thing since sliced bread? Should the Steelers be concerned about their start? Who's the more surprising division leader between the Bengals, Dolphins or Buccaneers? Are we buying or selling the FITZMAGIC? Did the Packers get hosed by the refs on the roughing the passer call? Should the Lions be worried about Matt Patricia? What are the Cardinals doing? Are the Bills worse than the 2017 Browns? All those questions answered plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
